channel.title: Pedro H. Chaves Maia
channel.description: Recent content on Pedro H. Chaves Maia

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Ph.D. candidate in Economics at FGV/EPGE Brazilian School of Economics and Finance. My research interests include urban and development economics, transportation economics, environmental economics and climate change adaptation. You can reach me at: maia.pedro@fgv.edu.br
